alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 13 at 7:54AM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch, highest in higher elevations from east central South Dakota across southwest Minnesota. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and east central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As temperatures slowly warm this morning, freezing rain will change to rain with icing improving after daybreak.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
